title: Wilson's Creek National Battlefield: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      The battlefield is open daily, except for Thanksgiving, Christmas Day and New Year's Day. The battlefield closes at Noon on December 24 (Christmas Eve).Visitor Center hours vary according to season. The 2016-2017 Visitor Center schedule is given below:January 1-April 2, 20169 a.m.-5 p.m.April 3-October 29, 20168 a.m.-5 p.m.October 30, 2016-April 20179 a.m.-5 p.m.Park (Tour Road) hours vary according to season. The 2016-2017 Tour Road schedule is given below:January 1-April 28 a.m.-5 p.m.April 3-May 278 a.m.-7 p.m.May 28-September 58 a.m.- 9 p.m.September 6-October 298 a.m.-7 p.m.October 30, 2016-April 20178 a.m.-5 p.m. Tour Road hours signs are located at the front gate, on the arm of the Tour Toad entrance gate, and next to the Tour Road entrance gate.
